data.name: AudioNotUseOffset
data.value: This audio does not use a loop offset

data.name: AudioPropertiesFormAudioExists
data.value: The audio will not be replaced, this audio is already loaded and stored in this project. The current one will remain.

data.name: AudioProperties_FileCorrupt
data.value: This audio seems to be corrupt, please load it again

data.name: Error_Adding_AlreadyExists
data.value: Sorry, cannot add an item with this name, an item with this name already exists

data.name: Error_Adding_AudioExists
data.value: This audio can't be loaded because already exists in this project.

data.name: Error_BuildSFX_NoHashcode
data.value: Can't build the soundbank file without a hashcode. Please set the hashcode for this file in the file preferences.

data.value: Sorry, cannot rename this item, an item with this name already exists

data.value: Error reading the file, the file format is corrupt or incorrect

data.name: Gen_Error_NameIsEmpty
data.value: The name can't be empty

data.name: Gen_Warning_StreamedSound
data.value: This sound should not be added here, is checked as a "Sample Streamed Sound" in the "SFX_Data.h" file. You should add it as a reference in "Streamed Sounds" section and add it to the common file.

data.name: Hashcodes_SFXDefines_NotFound
